title: Filmmaker Series:  Paul on The Bling Ring
itunes:title: Filmmaker Series:  Paul on The Bling Ring
description:
Paul and Chuck sit down to continue their Sofia Coppola series with her 2013 "crime drama," The Bling Ring. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
